entries.title: The Apothecary Diaries 2nd Season
entries.jpTitle: 薬屋のひとりごと 第2期（第2クール）

review.jp: やはり2クール目スタートの話としてこれ以上無い文句なしのものだったので10点に上方修正した。 ”2クール目もスタートの第13話。非常に面白かった。OPEDのアニメからも今クールの力の入れようが伝わってくる。前クールまでとちょっと違って3人娘の湯殿を絡めた立ち回りと展開、それに伴う上級妃絡みの話、またなにげに前皇帝も絡んでるし、前クールに続いて幽霊の話も絡んできてるしあらゆる意味でとにかく格の違いを見せつける素晴らしい回だった。まぁちょこちょこっとしたところの見せ方が本当に細やかで最高。個人的には壬氏が出てこない回が面白くて好き。あっぱれのスタート。”－9点・視聴継続

entries.synopsis: Maomao lived a peaceful life with her apothecary father. Until one day, she’s sold as a lowly servant to the emperor’s palace. But she wasn’t meant for a compliant life among royalty. So when imperial heirs fall ill, she decides to step in and find a cure! This catches the eye of Jinshi, a handsome palace official who promotes her. Now, she’s making a name for herself solving medical mysteries!

entries.title: LAZARUS

review.jp: ”あらゆる意味でちょっとレベルが違いすぎるし、またターゲットが明らかに前提として全世界、アニメファン世代問わず全対象的なものでリズム、音楽、アクション、構成、全ての見せ方が別次元だった。設定やテーマも非常に興味深くて第1話として申し分ないどころか実直にぶっ飛んでいて正攻法で叩きのめされた。主人公のアクション・パルクールでここまでずっとみさせられるとは・・。キャラデザ、キャラ、機械、乗り物、建物、あらゆるデザインも凄いものがあった。オリジナルだしこれから、とくに終盤や最後どうなっていくのかはわからないけど今のところは非常に楽しみ。やられたなー。”—10点

entries.synopsis: The year is 2052 — an era of unprecedented peace and prosperity prevails across the globe. The reason for this: mankind has been freed from sickness and pain. Nobel Prize winning neuroscientist Dr. Skinner has developed a miracle cure-all drug with no apparent drawbacks called Hapuna. Hapuna soon becomes ubiquitous… and essential. However, soon after Hapuna is officially introduced, Dr. Skinner vanishes.  Three years later, the world has moved on. But Dr. Skinner has returned — this time, as a harbinger of doom. Skinner announces that Hapuna has a short half-life. Everyone who has taken it will die approximately three years later. Death is coming for this sinful world — and coming soon.

entries.title: Once Upon a Witch's Death

review.jp: ”1話目厳しくしすぎたかもだけどそれはそれでいい。またこの第2話も正直めちゃめちゃズルい。これで泣かない人いるか？ただ前半の親友？のおじいちゃんの時計の話と後半の話の繋がり、またお師匠さんとヒロインの関係と想いというもの、そして思い出の木とおばあちゃんの繋がり、全ての繋がりと描き方、演出が素晴らしかった。それでも多少の粗さというか大雑把さみたいなものを感じないわけではないが大きな想いを作品から感じることが出来るのでいいと思う。OPEDにもそれが十分に現れている気がする。第2話からしっかりとキャラや作品の魅力が出ているのも高得点の理由。今後に期待。毎回泣かされるのは勘弁してほしいけど。”－10点・CW

entries.synopsis: On Meg’s seventeenth birthday, she learns that she only has one year left to live. Her mentor—the Eternal Witch, Faust—explains that she is cursed and the only way to save herself is to grow a seed of life using one thousand tears of joy. Of course, such tears aren’t easy to come by. As Meg begins her quest, she finds herself drawn into the lives of her friends and neighbors in ways she never imagined. By sharing their burdens and using her magic to comfort them, she learns how precious those moments of connection can be even in the face of death.

entries.title: Shoshimin: How to Become Ordinary 2

review.jp: こいつはとんでもない。OPEDもやばい。OPの1コマ目から持っていかれた。そして全体の構成・クオリティ、何もかもが1,2ランク上で圧倒的な才能が溢れている。1期を知らない人やこれ系、またこの雰囲気、小佐内ちゃんが好みじゃない人には全然刺さらないだろうということも承知しているがそれでも!と言いたいくらいの2期目のスタート(第11話)として間違いなく『凄い』と言えるものを見せてくれた。今までのものが確実に深く積み重なり結びつきつつそれが更にもっと厄介で怖いというのもいい。まぁ一つ一つの描写などが半端なくて最良質のドラマや映画を見ている感覚。っていうか小佐内が強すぎる。強いて言うなら新聞部部長の彼ってあんなに切れ者だったっけ?ってくらい。覚えてないんですけどね。それにしてもすげーな。ヨルシカやばいし。羊宮妃那ちゃんは薬がはまってますねぇ。ただ刺さらない人には全然刺さらないのは間違いない。せいぜい8点でしょう。ただ自分としては「薬屋」と本作は現時点で圧倒的に他の作品から抜け出ているのは間違いないということでこの今クール第1話に9点は付けられませんってことです。

entries.synopsis: The second season will focus on two new cases from the novel series, adapting the two-part third volume Shuuki Gentei Kuri Kinton Jiken (The Autumn-Exclusive Kuri Kinton Case) and the fifth volume Touki Gentei Bonbon Chocolat Jiken (The Winter-Exclusive Chocolate Bonbons Case).

entries.title: Uma Musume: Cinderella Grey
entries.jpTitle: ウマ娘 シンデレラグレイ

review.jp: ”比較的地味なスタートが逆に最初からやりすぎずにちゃんと積み上げていく見せ方としてすごく良かった。その中に絶妙に凄さや格の違いが垣間見えるしバックグラウンドや地方競馬の現実の中出の・・・という環境などもしっかりと描いていたのがここしばらくの派生エンタメでしかなかった「ウマ娘」フランチャイズとの違いを決定的に見せてくれていたと感じたので高得点を付けざるを得なかった。間違いなく面白いでしょう。”－９点

entries.synopsis: Unbeknownst to those around her in the destitute countryside of Kasamatsu, the staggering potential of this ashen-haired "Beast” will soon rock Japan with her feet and catapult her to the national stage—down the path of a legend.  Follow Oguri Cap and her insatiable appetite as the starting gates open on this Umamusume's hot-blooded Cinderella story!

entries.title: Sword of the Demon Hunter
entries.synopsis: In the Edo period, there was a shrine maiden called "Itsukihime" in the mountain village of Kadono. Jinta, a young man who acts as the shrine maiden's guardian despite being a stranger, encounters a mysterious demon who speaks of the far future in the forest where he went to defeat it. From Edo to the Heisei era, this huge Japanese fantasy series follows a demon man who travels through time while continuously questioning the meaning of wielding a sword.

entries.title: Can a Boy-Girl Friendship Survive?
entries.jpTitle: 男女の友情は成立する？（いや、しないっ!!）
entries.romanized_title: Danjo no Yuujou wa Seiritsu suru? (Iya, Shinai!!)
entries.synopsis: Childhood BFFs Himari and Yuu’s vow of friendship hits turbulence when Yuu reunites with his first crush in high school. Himari, who’s never known the fuzzy warmth of a crush, now must confront her feelings. Their shared dreams and peaceful days as a twosome gardening club are tested in this tale of love, flowers, and growing pains!

entries.title: Kowloon Generic Romance
entries.jpTitle: 九龍ジェネリックロマンス
entries.synopsis: Welcome to Kowloon Walled City: a dystopian townscape where the people are brimming with nostalgia, and where the past, present, and future converge. Amid the hidden emotions and extraordinary daily lives of the men and women working in its confines, a tale of romance begins to unfold for real estate agent Reiko Kujirai—one that feels as familiar as Kowloon itself…

entries.title: Apocalypse Hotel
entries.synopsis: Following the collapse of civilization, one storied hotel stands among the ruins of Tokyo’s Ginza district. Overrun by nature, this lone hotel continues to defy humanity’s collapse. Current guests: zero. Check-ins scheduled today: zero. Yesterday’s website traffic: zero. Enter with caution in this story of survival and mystery in a world where the memory of humanity begins to fade.

entries.title: Witch Watch
entries.synopsis: Morihito Otogi, a high school student who comes from a lineage of ogres, enjoys a peaceful, ordinary life until his childhood friend, Nico, moves in with him. Nico is a witch-in-training, and chooses Morihito to be her familiar. While Nico is thrilled to reunite with her old friend and crush, Morihito is tasked with the perilous duty to protect her from a foretold calamity. Between the unpredictable chaos caused by Nico’s magic, and the awkwardness of sharing a home, their lives become a whirlwind of supernatural hijinks and threats.

entries.title: The Catcher in the Ballpark!
entries.jpTitle: ボールパークでつかまえて！
entries.synopsis: To escape his tiring job, weary Murata finds escape at a nearby baseball stadium. While the games are thrilling, it’s Ruriko, the gyaru as cold as the beer she serves but secretly a sweetheart, who keeps him coming back. As her first regular, Murata discovers the warmth behind her frosty demeanor, and their hilarious, heartwarming encounters light up the ballpark and maybe even their hearts.

entries.title: A Ninja and an Assassin Under One Roof
entries.jpTitle: 忍者と殺し屋のふたりぐらし
entries.synopsis: On the way home from school one day, Konoha Koga rescues Satoko Kusagakure, a ninja who escaped her village. Soon, pursuers from the village show up in search of Satoko only to be deftly dealt with by Konoha. As it turns out, the unassuming high schooler is actually an assassin. Thus, the potentially cutthroat cohabitation of a ninja and an assassin begins!

entries.title: Me and the Alien MuMu
entries.synopsis: A cat-like alien from a distant galaxy, MuMu, arrives on Earth. His goal is to learn about home appliance technology on Earth to recover the technology his species has lost. The protagonist, Sakurako, has a typical university life, but everything changes with MuMu's arrival! What begins as an unexpected cohabitation quickly turns into a whirlwind of chaotic events. The chemistry between Sakurako and MuMu leads to a super-spectacular, appliance-filled, and cat comedy adventure.

entries.title: Mobile Suit Gundam GQuuuuuuX
entries.synopsis: Amate Yuzuriha is a high-school student living peacefully in a space colony floating in outer space. When she meets a war refugee named Nyaan, Amate is drawn into the illegal mobile suit dueling sport known as Clan Battle. Under the entry name "Machu," she throws herself into fierce battle day after day, piloting the GQuuuuuuX. Then an unidentified Gundam mobile suit pursued by both the space force and the police appears before her, along with its pilot, a boy named Shuji. Now their world is about to enter a new era.

entries.title: Rock Is a Lady's Modesty
entries.jpTitle: ロックは淑女の嗜みでして
entries.romanized_title: Rock wa Lady no tashinami Deshite
entries.synopsis: At an elite all-girls' academy where refined young ladies gather, Lilisa Suzunomiya, now the daughter of a real estate tycoon after her mother remarried, is forced to abandon her guitar and rock music to fit in. However, her passion is reignited by sounds from the old school building, where she meets a skilled drummer who shares her love for rock. Together, they embrace their inner rockstars, elegantly clashing and shouting their way through the academy in this captivating tale of grace and rebellion.

entries.title: Mono
entries.synopsis: Satsuki Amamiya was feeling down due to the graduation of the high school Photography Club’s president. However, her best friend and fellow member An Kiriyama encourages Satsuki to dedicate herself to the newly merged Cinephoto Club. Join Satsuki and An as they set out to track down a missing camera, meet new faces, and capture stunning photos and videos along the way.

entries.title: From Old Country Bumpkin to Master Swordsman
entries.jpTitle: 片田舎のおっさん、剣聖になる
entries.romanized_title: Katainaka no Ossan, Kensei ni Naru
entries.synopsis: Beryl Gardinant, a self-proclaimed “humble old man,” is a sword instructor at his dojo in a rural, backwater village. In his younger years, he dreamed of glory as a master swordsman, but those days are long behind him. Out of the blue, he receives a visit from a famous former pupil who brings him world-shattering news—he's been appointed as special instructor for the knights of the Liberion Order! With his life now turned upside down, Beryl travels to the capital and reunites with some of his former students: elite knights, an ace wizard, and even an adventurer who's attained the highest guild rank possible. But why do they all want his tutelage?! As far as he's concerned, they clearly don't need him anymore.

entries.title: The Shiunji Family Children
entries.synopsis: The Shiunji family with their seven children reside in a mansion within Tokyo’s Setagaya ward. The eldest son, Arata, is tired of being pushed around by his five sisters and daydreams of a life without them. That is, until Arata’s father reveals a shocking truth—Arata isn’t biologically related to his sisters! The siblings’ relationships will be tested as they navigate life in this new light.

entries.title: Food For the Soul
entries.jpTitle: 日々は過ぎれど飯うまし
entries.synopsis: An original animation about the daily life of five girls who have just become university students.  They love delicious food, want to have lots of fun with everyone, and try their best to study, so they're enjoying university life to the fullest!

entries.title: The Dinner Table Detective
entries.jpTitle: 謎解きはディナーのあとで
entries.synopsis: Rich heiress Reiko Hosho lives a double life as a novice detective, fighting crime under Inspector Kazamatsuri—also from a wealthy family. After work, Reiko sheds her pantsuit to don a lovely dress for dinner each day. Difficult cases force her to confide in her butler Kageyama, who proceeds to savagely ridicule her inability to solve mysteries, all while brilliantly unraveling each case himself.

entries.title: Anne Shirley
entries.synopsis: On the beautiful Prince Edward Island in Canada, an orphan named Anne Shirley is mistakenly sent to Green Gables, the home of Matthew and Marilla Cuthbert. They choose to adopt her anyway, as Anne finds friendship, love, and happiness in her new home. Come along for the story of a purehearted and imaginative girl growing up, leaving for college, and returning home a changed woman.

entries.title: Your Forma
entries.synopsis: In 1992, a pandemic of viral encephalitis shook the world. The medical technology that saved humanity evolved into “Your Forma”—an invasive information device implanted into the brain. In this world where every sight, sound, and even emotion is recorded, investigating major crimes means diving into the collective data, a job reserved for special detectives called “Electronic Investigator.”  Echika Hieda, a prodigious “Electronic Investigator” assigned at an astonishingly young age, stands isolated by her exceptional talent. Her newly assigned partner is Harold, a blonde, blue-eyed humanoid “Amicus.” Together, this unrivaled duo will expose every hidden secret.

entries.title: Zatsu Tabi: That's Journey
entries.synopsis: When aspiring manga artist Chika’s storyboards get rejected, she ditches her desk for an adventure! Armed with a quirky social media poll, she sets off on a spontaneous journey of random crowdsourced destinations. From hilarious mishaps to heartwarming encounters, Chika discovers inspiration, friendship, and herself, one unpredictable stop at a time.

entries.title: Please Put Them On, Takamine-san!
entries.jpTitle: 履いてください、鷹峰さん
entries.synopsis: Takane Takamine is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president is the apple of everyone's eye-including Koushi Shirota, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects whatsoever. But he'll soon find out the secret behind Takamine's unbelievable success-her underwear! When she strips, she can undo any of her past actions, and now that Koushi knows, Takamine won't let him off so easy...

entries.title: The Too-Perfect Saint: Tossed Aside by My Fiancé and Sold to Another Kingdom
entries.jpTitle: 完璧すぎて可愛げがないと婚約破棄された聖女は隣国に売られる
entries.romanized_title: Kanpekisugite Kawaige ga Nai to Konyaku Haki sareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru
entries.synopsis: Philia’s family has produced saints for generations. It’s no surprise that she’s known as the greatest saint of all time—and set to marry the second prince, Julius. What no one expects is for Julius to call off the engagement, claiming that Philia’s perfection makes her charmless and unlikable. To add insult to injury, Philia is packed off to a neighboring country in exchange for gold and resources, forcing her to leave her homeland! Despite bracing herself for mistreatment, Philia finds a warm welcome in her new town, where she puts her saintly abilities to good use erecting barriers against monsters and curing epidemics. But even as she flourishes in her new life, her homeland is under threat of destruction!

entries.title: Summer Pockets
entries.synopsis: Takahara Hairi never expected summer to feel like a dream. Sent to Torishirojima Island to sort through his late grandmother’s belongings, he’s met with endless sea, quiet nostalgia, and mysterious girls, each chasing something just out of reach. As he settles into island life, lost memories begin to surface and he finds what he never knew he’d lost.

entries.title: The Mononoke Lecture Logs of Chuzenji-sensei
entries.jpTitle: 中禅寺先生物怪講義録 先生が謎を解いてしまうから。
entries.romanized_title: Chuuzenji-sensei Mononoke Kougiroku: Sensei ga Nazo wo Hodoite Shimau kara.
entries.synopsis: Our setting is in Tokyo in 1948, just right after the war. Kanna Our setting is in Tokyo in 1948, just right after the war. Kanna Kusakabe had just become a second-year at a high school when she meets the new language teacher, Akihiko Chuuzenji. Mysterious supernatural things keep happening around Kanna. Once again today, Kanna is going to open the doors to the library prep room to seek help from the surly Chuuzenji-sensei who is waiting inside. A high school supernatural mystery featuring the unlikely duo between a teacher and a high school girl is about to begin!

entries.title: Kowloon Generic Romance
entries.jpTitle: 九龍ジェネリックロマンス
entries.synopsis: Welcome to Kowloon Walled City: a dystopian townscape where the people are brimming with nostalgia, and where the past, present, and future converge. Amid the hidden emotions and extraordinary daily lives of the men and women working in its confines, a tale of romance begins to unfold for real estate agent Reiko Kujirai—one that feels as familiar as Kowloon itself…

entries.title: Sword of the Demon Hunter

review.jp: 雑な所、もっと時間をかけて描いてたら・・・と思う所、ご都合なところ、謎に誰も突っ込まないところ・・・などなどを考えるとすごく良かったので感情では10点だけど・・・って感じで9点にします。”予想外の事態、『横浜アニメーションラボ』だから2クール決定しているとはいえ「どうせ・・・・」と思っていたが初回1時間（これも知らなかった）をたっぷり使った素晴らしい出来を見せてくれた。基本2000年代を感じさせる絵柄、設定、演出、ストーリーだがいずれいしても1時間の間ずっと引き込み続ける熱さとロマンをもって描いてくれた。そりゃあ設定や展開などに多少の粗さとかあるけどそれでも・・・と思えるものを見せてくれたし、170年という時を超えてという意味もわかりその設定にも非常に興味が持てた。その期間果たしてどの様に過ごしてきて何があったのかなどもこれからじっくり見せてほしいと期待してやまない。それでもやっぱり多少の粗さと過度なアピールのための残酷さは気になるので今後もうちょっとなんとかなると良いな・・・と思う。取り敢えず嬉しい期待外れでした。”

entries.synopsis: In the Edo period, there was a shrine maiden called "Itsukihime" in the mountain village of Kadono. Jinta, a young man who acts as the shrine maiden's guardian despite being a stranger, encounters a mysterious demon who speaks of the far future in the forest where he went to defeat it. From Edo to the Heisei era, this huge Japanese fantasy series follows a demon man who travels through time while continuously questioning the meaning of wielding a sword.

entries.title: Summer Pockets

review.jp: 久しぶりのKEY作品だからキープするけど相当やばい。クオリティも作画も脚本も演出も全てがやばくて意味不明だしテンポ悪いし魅力ないし外してるし。スロウスタートだと信じて様子見ます。ナンノコッチャ？

entries.synopsis: Takahara Hairi never expected summer to feel like a dream. Sent to Torishirojima Island to sort through his late grandmother’s belongings, he’s met with endless sea, quiet nostalgia, and mysterious girls, each chasing something just out of reach. As he settles into island life, lost memories begin to surface and he finds what he never knew he’d lost.
